description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows printing service spoofing vulnerability (CVE-2024-21406), perform the following updates:  

1. Identify your Windows version from the build numbers listed below.
2. Download and apply the relevant KB update based on your version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 (x64): [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (x64): [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
   - For other versions, refer to their respective KB articles provided above.
3. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update resolves a spoofing issue in the Windows printing service that could expose sensitive information.  
- The vulnerability affects various Windows 10 and Windows 11 builds.  

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is updated to one of the supported versions listed.  
- Backup any critical data before proceeding with installation.
